--- title: Vartopia Galaxy Link subtitle: Multi-Vendor Deal Registration short: connector tile: engine.png category: vendors ---

Connect your existing deal registration system to Vartopia Galaxy and help accelerate your deal registration program participation and effectiveness!

Connect your existing registration system to Vartopia and enable your Partners to submit, manage and measure their deal registrations from Vartopia Galaxy. Partners will be able to access your registration programs, either through the Vartopia Galaxy Portal or directly from their CRM.

Resellers using Vartopia see a significant increase in:

  • Submitted Deal Registrations
  • Approved Deal Registrations
  • Closed Deal Registrations

"We urge all of our technology partners to connect to the Vartopia Network because doing so ensures we will maximize our participation in their channel incentive programs and close more business."

- Dave Elsner, VP of Sales and Marketing - Nexus IS
